org.trianacode.taskgraph.service

Interface ControlInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RunnableTask

    public interface ControlInterface
    The interface used by control tasks to run tasks within their group and perform other control tasks.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void runGroup()
      Runs all the tasks within the group.
      void runTask(Task task)
      Runs the specified task.

    • Method Detail

      • runGroup

        void runGroup()
              throws SchedulerException
        Runs all the tasks within the group.

        If execution is paused then this method waits until execution is resumed, or throws a SchedulerException if execution is reset.

        Throws:
        SchedulerException

      • runTask

        void runTask(Task task)
             throws SchedulerException
        Runs the specified task.

        If execution is paused then this method waits until execution is resumed, or throws a SchedulerException if execution is reset.

        Throws:
        SchedulerException
